website_summaries.verdict: A low-price matte lipstick that can compete with designer brands.
pros: Delivers highly-pigmented color for up to 16 hours at less than half the cost of competitors
Features an arrow applicator for better control and precise application
Available in a variety of shades
cons: Reviewers said shades didn't always match the color of the swatches online, and it doesn't always last through meals

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick and the color! It feels moisturizing on my lips, I can add chapstick and it doesn’t get all streaky and gummy and it lasts forever. I was looking for a nude-ish color that didn’t make my lips look like ashy versions of themselves and this is it! Definitely recommend. Included a picture because nude colors tend to look a bit different on chocolate girls, so I wanted to give ya a gander at what this color looks like on this chocolate gal. :-)
customer_reviews.author: QueenofthehouseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Day two
customer_reviews.text: After discovering these, I quickly purchased one in every color. In the photo I'm waiting for my morning bus, the lipstick is a combination of loyalist and lover shades. I put them on yesterday afternoon. These shades don't move! If you're worried about them coming off, I've found chapstick, specifically Blistex will take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lover is a pretty color. Moisturize before applying.
customer_reviews.text: Moisturize before applying. It can be drying especially after a long day. Lover is a pretty medium pink color. Ruler is a dark red and too dark for me. But probably good for a more goth look. So far both colors turn darker after I put them on my lips. Not sure if that happens to everyone so plan accordingly when you’re deciding what color to get. Nice applicator and can take used to using especially with Ruler is not very forgiving due to its darker rich color. Definitely nicer when kissing others so it doesn’t get all over them compared to lipsticks. Photo is after wearing it all day without re applying. I applied Vaseline before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. I fell asleep with it on and it stayed on all night. It has amazing pigment and dries within about 5 minutes. As a busy mom I probably won't try another lipstick! Picture included is the color "loyalist"
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williamson

customer_reviews.title: VERY pigmented, long-lasting, great deal
customer_reviews.text: This literally will not come off unless you use heavy duty makeup remover (NOT makeup wipes, they'll just irritate the skin and do nothing to remove the color). It is a little drying, but you can always put lip gloss or chapstick over it after it dries. It's very pigmented. Probably my best liquid lipstick, definitely my cheapest. I'm buying a second one after like two days of owning the first.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Red!
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer Red. Let me just say this red is amazing. It has blue undertones which gives teeth a whiter appearance and also doesnt have any orange look about it. I have been searching for a go to red for a long time and finally found it. I will be ordering many more colors. At first the lipstick feels sticky but it turns into a matte. I always apply a translucent powder lightly over it to it will not have any stickiness to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Huntress is Fierce!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this matte lip stick!!! This color in the photo is called huntress. Stays on all day! It has a little tackiness when you pucker so had to deduct one star for that. The applicator is unique but worked well for me. Can't believe what a great find this is for the price (under $8)! I have much more expensive name brand lipsticks that aren't even close to this good. I definitely want to try this in other colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as drying as others
customer_reviews.text: One of the best liquid lip formulas. May feel a bit sticky at first but dries down and lasts forever without smudging or peeling like other, more drying formulas. I generally use two shades to create an ombré effect, a single shade can be a little flat because they’re so opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding day lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the colors Dreamer & Lover. This formula is awesome. I’ve been searching for a wedding day lipstick that won’t kiss off but feels comfortable on the lips. This is the one! I purchased lover first and loved it so much that I purchased 2 other colors! I will for sure be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a Believer
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this lip ink! I love the consistency, the applicator and most of all the color (I bought the color Believer). I did the drinking test a few times and non transfered over to my cup so that's great news. I'm not sure how long it will last because I literally just had it delivered and had to try it out. But, by what other reviewers said looks like it'll stand up. Oh and btw fastest delivery ever! I ordered it yesterday (I'm a Prime mbr) around noonish and received in less than 24 hrs! Great customer service! I defintely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: All Day Long!
customer_reviews.text: Warning about buying online here - the safety seal was broken so the product had been opened prior to my receiving it. The color "Lover" is much lighter than expected. I would say a light Pepto Bismol pink. It is easy to apply once you get the hang of the products consistency, which is a little thick. Once it dries, it definitely lasts ALL DAY which is awesome. Do not blot or press your lips together at all for at least 10 minutes after application or it will get tacky & blotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Vana Crane

customer_reviews.title: Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Best lipstick I've ever had for long-lasting wear. It's not perfect, of course. But it's good. It is a little sticky to start (see video) but it gets better throughout the day. I only noticed issues after lunch. The inner edge of my lips had worn off. But the rest pretty much stayed put the entire day. For the sake of scientific experimentation, I didn't reapply. But I'm sure you could and it would look great again. I loved this color (Voyager) and plan to get more!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylinn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This line of lipstick stays on! I have a few colors from them and this is no joke to remove. My skin has blue undertones and I’m very pale. I have a LOT of reds and this is my perfect shade. It does wear a bit at the waterline, but nothing much.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Dreadfully disappointed!! Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.text: Eek!!! Sooo disappointed in this color (Ruler) and product. I'd diligently searched reviews on YouTube to see how the color appeared on brown skin, but unfortunately it didn't work once received. The smell of this product is pleasant, but the pigment is extremely rich. I had to scrub this off of my lips using oil, makeup remover, and shea butter. It finally came off, but it really is like INK on your skin. I'd love my money back, but this item is non-returnable. Count it as a loss, but I'm really bummed.
customer_reviews.author: SHOE ADDICT 1982

customer_reviews.title: Lasts great!
customer_reviews.text: Lasts long and not drying!! Color was hard to choose, even looking at swatches. The neutrals/nudes like Seductress look great on others, but terrible on me (I tried it... very terra cotta clay pot color on). Photo is Lover, and I really like it for a pink. I wish there was a red that is more brick red - not orange or bright red - that is toned down. This pic was taken mid morning (approx 3 hrs after application) and after 2 cups of coffee with no touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: This color doesnt suit me.. but
customer_reviews.text: As a full time mother to twins, i always look for products with longevity. It is too light for me, washes me out. I thought it would look nice considering youtube beauty gurus. I am a mac nc35 for reference. As for the product, i like how long it stays. Food seems to be the only thing that takes it off so far. I wore it to a wedding <different color> and it stayed on from 3pm till 11pm. The middle part of my lip came off a bit so had to reapply there a bit. Keep in mind i did eat and drink.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Beltran

customer_reviews.title: ... with almost the same complexion as myself looked absolutely amazing with this lip color
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product because I saw a lady with almost the same complexion as myself looked absolutely amazing with this lip color. I was on my phone and purchased it immediately. When I put it on, it may be the batch or the formula itself, it’s wasn’t applying properly. It didn’t not go on smoothly. I had patches, where I have to reapply and it had a sticky feel to it when I press my lips together. My suggestion is wear gloss or chapstick before and after applying, it’s super dry.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: 8+ hours !
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lip stick. Please please please have a light hand when applying . It CAN get a little heavy and cakey 💄💋 Either then that it’s awesome the color is beautiful . It lasted on me 8+ hours without wearing off from drinking, kissing (just a peck lol) or eating . The quality i would to to compare it to the name brand Anastasia or Kylie lipsticks ! It also smells amazing 😍
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Tapia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LIPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is beautiful! It has a really good smell.... sort of like artificial vanilla/coconut. It dries down matte and is comfortable! It also lasts several hours, thru drinking beverages and eating food- however, I did not eat greasy food. I’m excited to try other colors in this line! I’m so glad I tried this lippy!
customer_reviews.author: Roblesfam7

customer_reviews.title: It's going to be a go to lip color...
customer_reviews.text: The angle lol... Anyhoo, I love this COLOR!!! And it smells like coffee! If you don't like coffee smell (what is wrong with you?!) it doesn't last forever. Or maybe you get noseblind to it. The longevity is good and it's mostly non-transferable. Not hard to remove at all. It's a superstay matte so it's a bit drying. Lip balm before helps. I'm gonna go buy the rest of the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Not boxed or sealed.
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick SEEMS fine but it wasn’t in a box, and the seal was already broken with a fine knife or something. Not ripped open just a precise slit along the edge. Not sure I trust it at all. I’ve heard of too many products being tampered with and sold as new on amazon. Will probably return and buy from a store. Just put it on and it’s staying sticky instead of drying into the matte... :/
customer_reviews.author: Twin mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome staying power
customer_reviews.text: Love Seductress for every day wear. Lover is too bold for me for every day. Both had AWESOME staying power. Minimal wear only on the insides of my lips after several hours. Other than slight stickiness I can’t even tell I’m wearing something on my lips. This is great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hall

customer_reviews.title: Dried up when opened.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order of this Maybelline Superstay Matte Ink this morning. I was excited to see what color it really would be on my lips; but when I twisted off the cap, the tip of the applicator was dried up with a hint of color. Was it supposed to be that way at first? So I decided to shake it up a little bit, then pulled the applicator off & re-insert it in a few times, but to no avail! I know that since the seal is torn when I opened it that it will not be returnable; but it would be simply courteous if somebody out there can respond to this problem. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anikanui

customer_reviews.title: Utter garbage, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Tube came with a broken seal, the tube was practically dry inside, formulae was sticky like glue and very streaky. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: PatternsInTheIvy

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Gold
customer_reviews.text: I own this lipstick in a darker brown shade and I have gotten so many compliments over the years I decided to buy a new color & went a bit more nude / pink hue rather than a brownish color which I usually wear. I. Am. Obsessed. This color does not come off, is smudge proof, easy to apply and makes your lips look so much bigger imo. I look forward to buying all the colors bc this stuff is liquid gold
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Smudge proof
customer_reviews.text: This lip color is the perfect burnt orange with a slight tint of red. Smudge proof and long lasting. Love it! Makes a statement every time!
customer_reviews.author: MzFig_6

customer_reviews.title: This is so fake - beware of knockoff product
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the fact that I already owned this product purchased at a drugstore, I wouldn't be able to make this comparison: I got "dancer" which is a brought red/orange in Matte Inj - not matte, it's glossy - streaky, not inky - doesn't have the vanilla smell this product is known for - never dries on the lips - very sticky formula, odd consistency - removing the applicator from tube is very hard Again, if I didn't already own this product I wouldn't be sure, but I am. I really hope Amazon looks into this and would be nice to receive my money back. Totally knockoff, scam.
customer_reviews.author: Helloelisha

customer_reviews.title: hope I'm not disappointed again.
customer_reviews.text: Color is very light, much lighter than pictured. I don't mind that it stays on all day, even after eating and drinking but it's not what I expected. I tried everything to take it off, including make up remover, the only thing that removed it from my lips was baby oil. When you first apply it, make sure you only apply it once or you will have creases and clumps all over your lips, and do NOT reapply, big mistake I made. Lips stick together the first couple of minutes so try to keep your lips apart while it dries. I am going to try a darker color, hope I'm not disappointed again.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: buy it from a store if you can
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this shade and brand from a brick and mortar store and loved it. It dried, did not smear, lasted all day. I only had to apply it once. I ordered a 2nd one, same color (when 1st was used up) from Amazon. I'm finding that for some reason it smears and wears out during the day. It also gums up on my lips. I went to Target and bought another one (#3), same color, and that is working just fine. No smearing, no gumming up. I'm not sure if the difference is that the Amazon one sat in my mailbox all day and heat impacted it, or if there is another reason for the difference.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best super Stay lip stick Ive tried so far. It’s actually moist feeling instead of super dry. It SMELLS GOOD. rich color. Perfect design for an applicator. One sweep and you’re done. Transfer free. The color was darker than the tube but maybe that’s because I have dark skin idk I still love it. Just perfect. It matches my dress perfectly ... I’m gonna pair it with this glitter lip kit i got for this weekend thank you! (Pics IG Xsixela) the moisture was the biggest surprise for me like it feels like soft lip gloss it’s insane
customer_reviews.author: IG xsixela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I washed my face with 3 different soaps and it didn’t even smudged, not even a little bit in the corners, the intensity also remained perfect. Then I used my regular make-up remover (neutrogena) and it came off completely, with no trace at all. This product is pure magic. I’m totally buying it in other shades. Update: I did buy more, in the picture I’m using pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Ditch Lip$ense, this is WAY better!
customer_reviews.text: On so many levels. There’s no stinging on application, it’s not drying, it lasts for.ev.er., and it costs over half the price! The one picture of the lighter color is Lover. The picture was taken after 4 hours of wear, no gloss, I’d eaten and drank in that time. The darker brighter color is Pioneer. This picture, this was taken 12 HOURS after application! Breakfast, lunch, dinner, oily foods, drank from glasses, kissed kids and a husband. But 12 HOURS! The inner part of my lips could use another swipe, but I NEVER reapplied! This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: 3LittleFish

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner chicken dinner !
customer_reviews.text: This arrived before dinner, perfect for product testing! It withstood : chicken fried steak & gravy, buttery baked potato and a drink...then later on a few potato chips & onion dip !!! OMG .. this is a keeper ( will be ordering more)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice long wear lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: It’s matte, true to color, and great for longevity! I was skeptical as I’ve tried other drug store brands and not been impressed. In fact I believe I’ve tried other Maybelline lip sticks and wasn’t crazy about them. This one must be from a different line because it was MUCH nicer. Closer to the quality of Kat Von D or Jeffery Star. Great purchase! I will likely get more colors. For the price you really can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Will not come off .....
customer_reviews.text: This MAYBELLINE product arrived without packaging or protective seal or wrapping The product is definitely INK Did not care for this Lip color at all While it did not smudge ... It was not easy to remove at ALL I had to use baby oil and vigorously rub with paper towel to try and remove the lip color Awful
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No refunds! Too tacky to wear
customer_reviews.text: Loyalist is a beautiful color but after 30 minutes it was still extremely sticky and hadn’t dried down at all. When I checked in the mirror it was cracked and uneven. It’s def long lasting bc I had to use oil to remove what was left of it, but it was so patchy and streaky and cracked and somehow still very tacky in spots that I couldn’t wait to get it off. What’s worse is that I too late I found out that it can’t be returned or refunded even though it’s sold and shipped by Amazon. $7 down the drain. I hope it’s only this color or batch that is bad.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Use app options for better color match
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about choosing the shade "Mover" because it looked too dark and loud in the website lip images (also it's a new shade at the time so less reviews). But on the "try the look" option in the Amazon prime app, it looked very good and natural on the skin tone that was closest to mine. Upon trying it on I am relieved to find that the app was reliable. I don't know if Amazon website has the same options, good if it does but I couldn't find it. Hence the title.
customer_reviews.author: ak2013

customer_reviews.title: Smudges more than If hoped, buy stain wears well
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking it would be a more matte version of the Maybelline SuperStay 24 I’ve used for years. That goes in a little sticky, but then once it’s one it stays totally smudge proof and wears well. This I like better immediately after putting on, is smooth and feel more like regular lipstick. Love the matte look. But smudges/wipes off. I almost end up applying, letting it be for a bit, then wiping off the smudgy part. Then it leaves a nice stained effect. Color Globetrotter is a nice warm brownish tone. Little darker than I wanted. Reordered Self-Starter and it’s about right.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & IceCream

customer_reviews.title: Yup, stays on. Color is rich.
customer_reviews.text: This stays on ALL Day - even with drinking/eating. The colors are bit different than the color on the package...but that is to be a bit expected as I'm sure it would look different on everyone a tiny bit. Colors are brighter on. I mixed two to get what I wanted and they work great. Love the precision applicator too. Once it sets, it does not feel dry or sticky. Gotta let it set for a few though...
customer_reviews.author: OneGirlsOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Sticky gritty mess
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Seriously horrible. First, there was no box or seal. I should not have even touched it to my lips but I wasn’t thinking. It goes on thick and gritty. I had to reapply to get an even coat. It was sticky. The applicator is strange. I was not pleased with the lipstick. Hope I can return it and I bought two, doh! Spend a little extra and get Kylie. It’s so much better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to try this product for a while now because I have seen it all over the internet. I purchased the shade “Lover” and am very satisfied. The color is very beautiful. It is a little sticky while it’s drying and does take a little bit of time to dry down. Once dry it is very long wearing. It smells like a sugar cookie or something sweet which I certainly enjoy. Overall I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, and works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I got 05 LOYALIST and It’s a little bit tacky feeling at first, kind of sticky, so give it to me to set and you won’t have that problem after a few minutes. It’s a very thick formula, but it’s lasted me all day, looks beautiful, and I’m in love with this. Thank you so much! I highly recommend this if you are short handed financially, but need a GOOD LIPSTICK to last all day. The absolute best I’ve gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Great lip stain!
customer_reviews.text: Loyalist- I love it! Very natural and subtle, which is what I wanted. It stayed on very well. I can’t say it will last 8 hrs or more. Mine lasted a good 5 hrs. I posted 2 pictures: first one is immediately after application and the other one is 5 hours later, after eating a drinking. So I think a second application is needed around 4-5 hrs, but I can handle that. But keep in mind my color is very subtle and so maybe a darker color might last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: The Ruler is the perfect red!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I am a fair complexioned brunette and the RULER is my perfect red - not too bright, not too dark, not orange, etc. It's just perfect. During the day I add a little chap stick or lip gloss just because I'm not used to the matte. I can even sleep with this on and it still looks great the next day. The only reason you might have to reapply is if you eat greasy food and wipe it off. What a fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Kts

customer_reviews.title: I love Maybelline's SuperStay line!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars for moisturizing because liquid lipsticks can only get to a certain level of "moisturizing," to be honest. It does NOT dry out my lips like some of the other drugstore brands I've tried, but it will eventually dry them out if you leave them on all day. Which brings me to my next point, they stay on for forever! I really only use Beauty Bakerie brand liquid lipsticks because they really do STAY on your lips, but this is a CLOSE second, especially because it's significantly cheaper than Beauty Bakerie. Comes in great colors, my personal favorites are the ones with orange undertones or brown. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the shade seductress, and overall it is a nice shade for my light skin with yellow undertones. It smells great, and applies nicely. You do have to work in light layers, so it is able to dry down in between; and it doesn't feel super drying. The color is different than what it appears on the tube, so it's hard to really know what you're getting. If you're looking for a matte lip, this is pretty good though.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nasty color.
customer_reviews.text: This may be an OK lipstick, but Loyalist is the most ugly color you can imagine. The photo looked nice, but the actual thing is chalky and ugly. If you buy this stuff don't get that color. I can't imagine it would look good on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fade!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital clinic, and I decided to try my new Pioneer shade out today. Guys, this picture is after eating lunch and working an 8 hour workday. This. Stuff. Does. Not. Move. The color is very rich, and does not smudge. I am amazed that I didn’t have to reapply once. Absolutely happy with this purchase. The one downside is that it is a bit drying, so if you have dry or flaky lips I would probably not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vwelyn

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing. Believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: Amazonian after several hours of wear. Apply and then gently blot once. Allow to completely dry and the stickiness will go away. If it’s dried properly it will feel weightless and will have no drying effect. It also does very well when standing up to eating and drinking. You might need a slight reapplication to patch a spot that wore away too much after a big lunch but it will definitely stand up to a few kisses and some drinks. I recommend Amazonia as a nude for those with a light/medium skin tone like mine. I tried seductress and I think that one works better for very fair skinned women.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FANTASTIC!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every kind of matte lipstick. THIS IS FANTASTIC !!! I put it on in the morning had breakfast,lunch and dinner and it did not lose any of it's color all day! I woke up the next morning and it looked like I had just put it on. BEST LIPSTICK EVER .
customer_reviews.author: frances alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Chalk Paint
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this based on the reviews. It is like putting chalk paint on your lips. I did some tests because I was shocked how hard it was to remove, a regular tissue won't take it off, soap and water won't take it off and a makeup remover towelette does eventually after rubbing your lips raw. The worst part was not that, afterall it is called SuperStay, the worst art is getting on your teeth where it is also difficult to remove!! Finish is flat matte like chalk, so your lips better be super hydrated or your lips will look like cracked mud. #55 Driver makes you look like a mummy.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever, but STICKY
customer_reviews.text: As someone that loves matte liquid lipsticks, I'm always on the hunt for one that will last all day. After hearing about the longevity of this one I decided to give it a shot. It really does last, but it never really dried down. It left my lips slightly sticky and it's a feeling I really don't enjoy. I bought another shade hoping that I had just gotten a bad batch or that it was just that specific color, but my other color is the same. So as long as you don't mind your lips sticking together slightly, then this is a great product! I really do love how long it lasts and that it doesn't transfer to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann S.

customer_reviews.title: Too orange
customer_reviews.text: This color is too orange. A lot more orange than the online sample and the container it is in. I have purchase this from my local drug store in a different color, and the color does last, even all night if I forget to remove it before bed. Good product, but they need to work on their packaging and sample images, especially since I can't return it. Disappointed, but not with the seller necessarily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of application! Lined lips with lip liner prior to applying Founder. Loved the color, but didn't stay out after 15 minutes of letting it "set". Creased into lip lines, transferred onto cup and napkin, and had to reapply missing areas. Doesn't live up to claim of being smudge or transfer proof. Sadly, returned Founder, but also purchased Voyager in which I couldn't return.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAngel

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Cannot return because it’s flammable
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you know you like the color because you are unable to return. Apparently this is flammable until it dries and this is only an issue when shipping it back. No mention on the box it was shipped in. As far as the product, the color isn’t consistent with the photos shown. It’s sticky even after drying, and makes my lips look scaley and damaged. Which they definitely are not. Will not be trying any other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M

customer_reviews.title: Stays and looks hydrated
customer_reviews.text: This was seductress outside and blended with self started. They are hydrating for being matte. They do look matte but they also look moisturized. I would say the only thing is that the pale inside lip contrasts too much with the lipstick... They also smell good. I saw a lot of pictures with people with very dry lips, do noooooot apply this more than one layer, rather, put a little bit and blend it with your fingers to get a natural look. It will not crack, look dry or make a huge difference from the inside lip after an hour (that looks so bad). Overall great matte lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This lip color has lasted for 7 months!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love this Maybelline lip color! I bought it 7 months ago oh, and I am actually still using it. I use it everyday. I got it in raspberry. I like a long lasting lip color and this one fits the bill ( let it dry for about 10 minutes first). This wins out over Cover Girl ColorStay because there is no need to put a gloss over it and the lip color comes in a container that's surprisingly larger than what I've been used to. That's why I've had it for 7 months before having to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Mimicgal

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Really nice colors and definitely last all day. But the formula is very drying. I bought a bunch of colors to try, after seeing so many beauty bloggers rave about the staying power. The lipsticks made my lips so chappy and dry, and it is damaging. I'm bummed because at first I was excited to use these for work due to the staying power. But it's just not worth it because of the damage it does. Maybellin products have never suited me. The foundations make me break out so badly, and the lipsticks are a no go too. Giving 3 stars only because of the staying power and colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought the color self-starter after trying it out on one of my photos; what a great idea!! It was the best color I have purchased in years...not too light or too bright, but enough to look “special”. It is my new go-to color, & it even lasts through a dentist appointment! Since I work at home, I don’t always take the time with makeup & special care, but I have vowed to change that. This product is easy to apply & LASTS!!! It looks better than many of my more expensive brands & I have many.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Dried terribly!
customer_reviews.text: Meh.... I’m super bummed how this looks and feels :( It’s hard to explain the feeling of it on your lips after it dries... definitely feels like it doesn’t belong! I even put on some Burt’s Bees lip colour underneath, but it’s not helping! And when you move your lips around, it feels like frosting that dried and is crumbling!!!! Not worth the money.. and now I’m still searching for the perfect mauve/pink matte....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worst Matte Product, very drying, don’t waste $$$
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible!! It literally sucked ALL the moisture out of my lips the minute the matte product touched my lips!! I have tried many matte products but this has to be bay far the worst. Sad part is I can’t even get my $ back, it was a prime product & is not returnable. Don’t waste your money! At least at some local drug stores you’re allowed to exchange or return.
customer_reviews.author: Kini816

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now or live with regret for life. Your choice.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I am going to definitely buy all the colors, and also give them as gifts. It lasts ALL DAY. You can reapply once if needed and it looks just as fresh as when it was first applied. It doesn't transfer, and no gloss is needed to keep sealing it. I was a lipsense lover, but to be honest, I love this product more and this one is affordable! Buy it. Hit Add to Cart RIGHT NOW.
customer_reviews.author: smills5215

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this color for fall and it looks really nice on her. It does smell like a sweet cake and it stays put. It didn't get on her face mask and stayed on all day until she took it off with makeup remover. It is drying, so keep that in mind. She remedies this problem by using a balm that she has from the 24 hour superstay
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Gross & sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this praised everywhere online as being the "holy grail" of matte liquid lipsticks, so I decided to give it a try. I regret spending the $8 on this lipstick. It's either sticky when it goes on and stays tacky most of the day, or it goes on sticky and then dries to an unappealing crust and flakes off throughout the day. All in all, a waste of $8. It does stay on, but your lips look like you've been picking at them for months and letting them bleed and not heal. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Roland

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Lasts FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick ive been collecting every color. Recently ordered 118 dancer. It's a rich candy apple red, the color looks off in the display.... it's definitely legit red. This stuff STAYS ON. Ive slept in it and touched up in the AM. Sometimes I get a little color on my chin when eating/ kissing but not enough to stain my skin. If put on thick, it feels a bit sticky for a while. Light coats dry pretty smooth. If you've been debating this purchase, just buy it. I take it off with vaseline or an oil based remover and be patient lol. Try not to let it bleed onto facial skin for too long or it will stain.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lefforge

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lipstick Right away I could tell that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lipstick Right away I could tell that it wasn't gonna come off Easy. I took a drink of my water bottle nothing came off, I took a hit off my bong nothing came off.. ( major score with me on that one)I Now know for sure I can go through lunch or dinner without it coming off on a cup or fork and without it getting on my teeth. Now i dont smoke Cigarets so I don't know if it would come off on that I'm pretty sure it wouldn't. I would and I will definitely buy more colors...
customer_reviews.author: kevin catterall

customer_reviews.title: Great red with blueish undertones.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Will update re longevity after a few days. I did notice some color bleeding around the edge of my mouth after dinner, but nothing major. I love the color. It's a red with blueish undertones which I need with my complexion and red hair. I avoid the pink or orange undertones- this shade doesn't have those. I like how it glides on and the consistency of it, just one swipe & enough color goes on. Have used Maybelline long lasting #507 for years and this may be my new favorite color
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Frenger

customer_reviews.title: Prep lips with some type of moisturizer first, thank me later x
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! WELL! I will say though, it does dry your lips a little bit (not dramatically lol, just makes them feel like they are a bit) it is definitely smudge proof and long lasting. Also, it stays on through everything... and oh yes, I do mean EVERYTHING sis (; (; definitely recommend! Works better and lasts longer than some other, more expensive brands that I have tried before. 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Changes Color
customer_reviews.text: This formula is so interesting. It almost feels like rubber on the lips and at first that made me think it was coming off or wearing weird but it wears great. What throws me off is that the color changes, it's sort of too pink and light at first and then over the course of a few hours it starts to darken and become more purple on my lips! Anyone else experience this? I kind of like the darker, cooler color better, but it just feels weird because you have to be ok with wearing light pink and then more of a dark, dusty purple/mauve later?
customer_reviews.author: K Blake

customer_reviews.title: Experiment for really long color
customer_reviews.text: Sticky feel when first put on, but I put similar color lipstick over it, blot, then a moisturizer. Has not felt heavy when complete, but I still have color hours later. With just lipstick, I usually have no color after just a very few hours, even if I only drink water. It makes a great base which will last until you remove.
customer_reviews.author: BamaMama

customer_reviews.title: My forever liquid lipsticks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these lipsticks over a year and I absolutely love them. They are super pigmented and stay up to 16 plus hours. It withstands all kind of greasy food ( might fade little bit on your inner lips...but it doesn't bother that much). I have an Indian tan skin tone, and I use the shade MOVER ( dusty pink) and FIGHTER(Light brick brown) as my daily office shades. I also have PIONEER(Classic Hollywood Red!), RULER( Deep rose color), FOUNDER(Magenta shade), Voyager( Dark Red), LOVER( Pretty summer pink). Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan Ramarajan

customer_reviews.title: If you're crunchy it's not for you.
customer_reviews.text: I love and hate this. I love it because Lover is the perfect color for me. Blue undertones so it looks good with my skin. I hate the ingredients though. Fragrance is way too strong. The fact that it has a synthetic fragrance means it has phthalates which are harmful to humans. So I'm not happy about that. Maybelline needs to ditch the fragrance and toxic ingredients. I don't want to be eating aluminum thank you. Full ingredients in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Chitowngirl

customer_reviews.title: Voodoo magic lipstick--stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Ah-maze-ING! I usually don't wear lipstick because I drink water and eat all day and it never stays. It either smudges, gets on my water bottle or on my teeth. I hate lipstick. But I read someone review about this stuff and decided to try it. It is amazing! Goes on nice and smooth, one blot and it's set for like 16 hours. I have to scrub it off with make up remover wipes. It doesn't come off! Not drinking, eating, kissing, rubbing with my hand... Amazing voodoo magic lipstick. I now own three different colors and wear it everyday, even when I don't have anywhere to go!
customer_reviews.author: BRIE

customer_reviews.title: Stays put but feels sticky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased color LOVER - 015. Color is cool toned nutural/ berry. I may have done it wrong, but it takes about 10 min to dry and feels still kinda sticky through the day. I added pictures for after application and half a day through, with eating and drinking in between. It dries on the edges and stay put but still sticky in the corners and along inner edge, regardless how long time had passed. Also, for me it turned darker color when dried.
customer_reviews.author: masha

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I received an older product of the batch, it is so messy to use. Have to wait a long time for it to dry and not smear all over everything like the skin on the outside of my lips, a cup or glasss. As I don't care for this product, it could just be me and how I expect my products to act or not be. You may love it. It's a good color for the young and old. More so for the spring and summmer seasons. If you have time to allow your lip products to settle and dry, then you will love it. It does stay put all day.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Haga

customer_reviews.title: Not Kiss Proof in the Slightest
customer_reviews.text: This has worse staying power than some cheap off brand lipstick I got from Walgreens. It's a lovely colour and that's the only reason it got two stars. It's hard to apply, multiple layers are neccessary for it to be opaque, and even after letting it dry (ain't my first rodeo) it was coming off on my drinks and when I kissed. I was left with smudged, patchy lipstick and that bit wouldn't come off. So I guess if patch lip stains are your thing, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: TRULY LONG WEARING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It truly stays on. I can put it on and eat and drink and it still stays on. In fact I have to use makeup remover to take it completely off. It is a bit dry - matte finish. Maybelline needs to improve their colors. That is the only thing about this product I do not like - the colors are not great! I have now spent a fortune trying to find a good color!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Stays on
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick really stays on! I ate lunch, wiped my lips and when I was done it was still on. No need to reapply. I purchased the color "Founder". It looks great, not too red, it's more like a wine color. It doesn't feel dry but I don't feel it moisturizes either. It does feel a little sticky but if your not smacking your lips together then it doesn't matter. I'll be purchasing this in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: CPac

customer_reviews.title: DREAMER a.k.a. Pepto pink!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this lipstick. It has great staying power! It is a little tacky but not unbearable. I may have applied it a little too thick. I am including a picture but not because it looks good. I ordered the color DREAMER after reviewing a lot of photos in the reviews. The product usually looks so different on, that photos help. I really hate this color. It looked better in photos. I wanted everyone to see a non glam photo of this color. It’s PEPTO PINK!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Elghadi

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting and Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they really are long lasting and smudge proof! The matte looks so good and I really dont even need to use that much on some of the colors! Only thing is I expected the color to be more like the way it looks on the tube, but I should've relied more on the "try on" photo feature that Amazon offers, which is pretty accurate. For example, "seductress" was more pink than I realized. I also have Amazonian and Voyager and I really like all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Ruler which ha red tons. What I got today says ruler bit it’s very brown, to dark for what I wanted.. not happy.. very far off from what I ordered.. I took pics of what I received to what I should have for a color.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does stay on your lips for a long time. It does need a quick tidy up reapplication if you’re eating or drinking throughout the day. Other than that it’s a great product, lovely color that looks great with all outfits. It can be a little sticky until it fully dries but after a while you forget you have it on until you pass a mirror and it catches your eye.
customer_reviews.author: EllieC

customer_reviews.title: did not apply smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of skeptical of buying cosmetics online and this reminds me why. I heard RAVE reviews about this, but when I got it, I didn't like it at all. I found it to be drying and cakey and just...bad. I'm not sure if I got a fake, or if the weather affected the formula, or if it's just not a good product for me. The color is fine, a little more light pink than I expected. But I didn't think it was particularly long-lasting and it just did not apply smoothly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Burlap

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t go anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This was my teenage daughters dance team required lipstick for this season. Instead of driving all over town looking and fighting 20+ other kids for this I ordered here and watched TV. Color is intense and beautiful, great application wand that gets saturated with product. Has a tapered tip to get into each nook and cranny of lips. Lasts foreverrrrrrr doesn’t wipe off easily which is perfect for in between changing costumes. She’s worn it just inbher daily life as well and says it’s not drying.
customer_reviews.author: Nava

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase something requiring color online. I liked that it showed how the color may look on fair, medium tone and dark toned skin. it was spot on! color was perfect and it stayed on all day. I will definately be purchasing more. It is not real moisturising, but not too bad. I put it on early this morning and it is nearly 6pm. it is still on and my lips are not shriveled but do feel a bit tight. I would definatley recommend and I will purchase another color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. neff

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the color lover,I thought it was going to be a bit lighter for an everyday lip color but I like it. I plan to buy more colors,great for a mom on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sadiq

customer_reviews.title: Love this lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lipstick, I would take it over MAC or more expensive lipstick any day. I had long struggled finding a lipstick that survives a meal until I found this lipstick! I now own it in 4 shades of varying hues-- even the red one last forever and survives meals. I would recommend putting chapstick underneath it as it is a matte lipstick but sometimes I skip that step and it dries out a lot faster than others. Do be carefully for like 10 minutes after putting it on that it doesn't get on your teeth, but once dry you will no joke need makeup remover to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and very natural color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color...very neutral and natural..so natural that my kids didn’t notice I had on lipstick...but that’s what I wanted. So, yes I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: courtnkids

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness this is wonderful stuff I love the matte Ink. Every time I wear those I get compliments and I'm not exaggerating every single time I wear it and it comes in beautiful colors.I hope they never stop making it. I have told a handful of people to go on Amazon and buy this I should probably get a commission LOL I am giving it five stars but as far as moisturizing it's not dry but it's not moisturizing (if that makes sense)sometimes I put on a little Chapstick over it and that makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beyond disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a color that was NOT even close to what was pictured. I requested to return and was told it was not eligible because it's a "liquid." Seriously?! You shipped it to me and it was a liquid but you cant except it back the same way it was sent? Come on...what a scam! Now I'm out of $7 for a horrible shade that I know of no one who can use. ***it should state that it's not eligible for return.**
customer_reviews.author: JSCRIBBLE

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this color
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this liquid lipstick. First of all, every nude is not created equally, but this begs to differ. I have seen reviews of women of different colors and shades and this color is amazing! It's as if it plays off the tone of your skin. I always find it difficult to find a good nude that goes with my skin tone and also to find a matte liquid lip that lasts all day long - Maybelline has done it! And the best part about the Liquid Lipstick is that it makes it looks like your real lip color as opposed to a color that's laid on top. Love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Smith

customer_reviews.title: A nice matte for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of trying different brand mattes and so far this one hasn't been too bad. Get's a little sloppy sometimes trying to apply but goes on smooth, dries pretty quick, doesn't feel overly weird/dry on lips, and stays on for quite a few hours. It does however stain your lips a little when you go to take it off but no biggie. So far a good buy, decent price, considering trying a few other shades. My first, Voyager has been a hit and loving the color.
customer_reviews.author: RLo

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Too pink and almost invisible. I was hoping for more of a brown color and this is just light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Northcoastbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for a drug store brand
customer_reviews.text: I heard from a youtube makeup guru that this was a decent product, so I decided to try it out.. and WOW it has the staying power. Like any matte liquid lip it can be drying, but no more so than any other ones I normally use. This more than others is quite difficult to take off, so be prepared. I recommend a makeup remover that takes off waterproof makeup. It can feel a little tacky/sticky at first , but lick your lips and that seems to set it. Want to buy more shades. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, vibrant, long lasting, but kind of sticky
customer_reviews.text: The colors is gorgeous, and it lasts a really long time. Very vibrant. Matte. My only issue with it is that for the first hour or so after putting it on, my lips are sticky, but after that it feels fine. Definitely is not moisturizing, but I never expect a matte lipstick to be, so that's not an issue, I just use chapstick with it to help. Anyway, I really love how long it lasts, and how opaque it is. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: GrayCat

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just don’t mesh with liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shade dreamer. I’m very fair skinned with red undertones and it looks very good on me. I think I just don’t like the feeling of liquid lipsticks in general, but this is the 2nd best formula I’ve tried next to the YSL one. Neutral shades in general I prefer to just reapply throughout the day because it’s quick and easy but I’d love to try the red shade of this because that’s application I struggle with and would like a formula that is long lasting. I will update this review after trying the red shade.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: Staying Power x 200%
customer_reviews.text: This brand is amazing. I Just don't care for the color. I use another color ''Lover '' almost daily and it's probably the best lip color I've ever used. Literally will stay on all day!! I can drink, eat... all of it, and it goes no where!! It could dry out your lips over a period of time, but i put on some Blistex Medicated before i apply the Matte Ink and no dry lips - EVER. And I still get my matte lips! It's the perfect combo.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Color stays a very long time
customer_reviews.text: I have several colors of this. I find that the colors do look different than they do on the computer so you might want to buy something that looks lighter than what you want. They all do an amazing job staying on a really long time. I bought this one because I was starting a job as a casino dealer and couldn't be reaching in my pocket to reapply lip gloss while I was working. I have way too many colors now but I really love the product. Stays on great!
customer_reviews.author: zoogirl0

customer_reviews.title: Could last through anything
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this, it lasted so long I almost got concerned. I applied it once at 7am and it lasted through all my water, coffee, meals, and talking ALL DAY. I even had to work hard with the makeup wipes to get it off. The color is also pretty and it’s easy to apply. It smells very nice, not overwhelming like some lipsticks. It doesn’t flake or smudge, but it does settle into the lines of your lips. It doesn’t bother me, though. I love this and will be buying it whenever I can.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Glavic

customer_reviews.title: Stays all day and beyond. Beautiful shade!
customer_reviews.text: This is far better than Cover Girl Color Stay. Color Stay dries out my lips so bad, and then it literally starts to peel off like a second skin. Gross! Maybelline Outlast keeps my lips hydrated all while staying on through meals, coffee, fidgeting, more coffee, and the color is really flattering. It's a neutral pink shade, and gives a nice boost to my lips natural color. For days that I want to keep it simple, this color is perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

product_meta.title: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink Un-nude Liquid Lipstick, Seductress, 0.17 Fl Oz, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Color:65 SEDUCTRESSGo Unnude with attitude. It's a new take on neutral lipstick. Unexpected. Unconventional. Up to 16 hours of liquid matte intensity! Ink your lips in up to 16 hours of saturated matte with Maybelline New York’s Superstay Matte Ink™ Un-nude Liquid Lipstick! This highly pigmented lip color features a unique arrow applicator for precise application. The formula is long-lasting and gives a flawless matte finish. Shades range in neutral liquid lipstick shades from nudes to unconventional nude lipstick shades. For easy removal, use with Maybelline's SuperStay Eraser lipstick remover. Most ingredients derived from grain sources are highly refined and retain no traces of gluten proteins. For less refined ingredients from natural sources, Maybelline has established strict limits on the level of potentially allergenic proteins. Since individuals exhibit a wide range of sensitivities to these proteins, if you have any questions or concerns you should discuss with your medical care provider.
feature_bullets: ALL DAY MATTE LIPSTICK: This highly pigmented matte liquid lipstick goes on smooth, lasts up to 16 hours, and is available in a range of super saturated shades including nude shades to classic red lipstick. Ink your lips in gorgeous, matte lip color.

LIQUID LIPSTICK THAT STAYS AND SLAYS: SuperStay Liquid Lip Color lasts through the day, no matter how many bites, sips or kisses you throw its way! Glides on with the precision tip applicator and delivers deeply pigmented lipcolor that stays put all day.

PUCKER UP: Layer on intense color that lasts with Superstay 24 hr Lipcolor, slay a matte lip with SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick, renew with Baby Lips Moisturizing Lip Balm, or add gloss to any color with clear lip gloss topcoat.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look--foundation, bb creams, concealers & highlighters to create a perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
